Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:[a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso(b?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:function:[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+(:(\$LATEST|[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+))?$  
Update requires: No interruption

LambdaEndpointInput.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceEndpointType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LAMBDA | URL  
Update requires: No interruption

HealthUrl.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^https?://[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%=~_|]$  
Update requires: No interruption

Url.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^https?://[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%=~_|]$  
Update requires: No interruption

---

---

Maximum Length: 14  
Pattern: ^app-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256

EnvironmentIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 14  
Maximum Length: 14

Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^(?!svc-)[a-zA-Z0-9]+[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 21  
Pattern: ^vpc-[-a-f0-9]{8}([-a-f0-9]{9})?$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: Metadata that you can assign to help organize the frameworks that you create. Each tag is a key-value pair.

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:refactor-spaces:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\w{12}:[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$
